Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball returned to the NBA court after 1,006 days and three surgeries.
In 15 minutes of playing time, Ball finished with 10 points on 4-of-6 shooting from the field, 2-of-4 shooting from three-point range.
Ball also had one rebound, one assist, one steal, and one block.
Ball hit his first shot 43 seconds after checking in, sending the United Center into a frenzy.
Ball made a reverse layup and a deep three-pointer during the game.
Ball blocked Julius Randle and made a signature off-ball rotation to force a steal.
Post-Match Reflections: The Bulls gave Ball the game ball after his preseason return.
Ball's return is seen as a feel-good moment of the NBA season.
